# Document

Entity which hold group of PDF pages

# Properties

# originalFilename - String

# Methods

# addPages(Number pageNumber, Page | List<Page> page=null)

Add page at specified location

  • Props:
    • pageNumber- Number
    • page- Page | List<Page>, defaults to "null"
  • Returns: List<Page>

# addWatermarkToPages(Page overlayPage, Position position=BACKGROUND, Number | List<Number> pageNumbers=null)

Add overlay page as watermark to full document or list of pages

  • Props:
    • overlayPage- Page
      any page can be used as overlay
    • position- Position, defaults to "BACKGROUND"
      FOREGROUND or BACKGROUND
    • pageNumbers- Number | List<Number>, defaults to "null"
      null means whole document
  • Returns: Document

# attach(Document attachment)

Attach a document

  • Props:
    • attachment- Document
  • Returns: Document

# attach(String path, String password="")

Attach a document from path

  • Props:
    • path- String
    • password- String, defaults to """"
  • Returns: Document

# clone()

Clone a document

  • Returns: Document

# cropPages(Region region, Number | List<Number> pageNumbers=null)

Crop pages

  • Props:
    • region- Region
    • pageNumbers- Number | List<Number>, defaults to "null"
      null means whole document
  • Returns: Document

# deletePages(Number | List<Number> pageNumbers)

Delete pages

  • Props:
    • pageNumbers- Number | List<Number>
  • Returns: List<Page>

# duplex()

Make document duplex for printing

  • Returns: Document

# eachPage(Consumer<Page> consumer)

Iterate over each page

  • Props:
    • consumer- Consumer<Page>
  • Returns: void

# extractPages(Number | List<Number> pageNumbers)

Extract pages into new returned document

  • Props:
    • pageNumbers- Number | List<Number>
  • Returns: Document

# getMetaData()

Get all meta data of document

  • Returns: MetaData

# getPage(Number pageNumber, boolean fromLast=false)

Get a page from Document

  • Props:
    • pageNumber- Number
      index starts at 1
    • fromLast- boolean, defaults to "false"
      default false
  • Returns: Page

# getPageCount()

Get number of pages in document

  • Returns: Number

# getPages()

Get list of pages

  • Returns: List<Page>

# movePages(Number insertBefore, Number | List<Number> pageNumbers)

Move pages

  • Props:
    • insertBefore- Number
    • pageNumbers- Number | List<Number>
  • Returns: Document

# removeMetaData()

Remove all meta data from document

  • Returns: MetaData

# resizePages(PaperSize | Number size, Boolean resizePage=true, Boolean resizeContent=true, BasePoint basePoint=CENTER, Number | List<Number> pageNumbers=null)

Resize document or list of pages

  • Props:
    • size- PaperSize | Number
    • resizePage- Boolean, defaults to "true"
    • resizeContent- Boolean, defaults to "true"
    • basePoint- BasePoint, defaults to "CENTER"
    • pageNumbers- Number | List<Number>, defaults to "null"
      null every page in document
  • Returns: Document

# reversePages()

Reverse the order of pages in a document

  • Returns: Document

# rotatePages(Number rotation=0, Number | List<Number> pageNumbers=null)

Rotate document or list of pages in clockwise direction

  • Props:
    • rotation- Number, defaults to "0"
    • pageNumbers- Number | List<Number>, defaults to "null"
      null means whole document
  • Returns: Document

# split(Predicate<Page> p)

Split a document into multiple document

  • Props:
    • p- Predicate<Page>
      OnMatch/OnChange
  • Returns: List<Document>

# split(Number n)

Split a document into multiple document based on number of pages

  • Props:
    • n- Number
      number of pages
  • Returns: List<Document>

# translatePages(Number tx, Number ty, Number | List<Number> pageNumbers=null)

Translate document to x, y location

  • Props:
    • tx- Number
    • ty- Number
    • pageNumbers- Number | List<Number>, defaults to "null"
      null means whole document
  • Returns: Document

# getAuthor()

Get author

  • Returns: String

# getCreationDate()

Get creation date

  • Returns: Date

# getCreator()

Get creator

  • Returns: String

# getCustomValue(String fieldName)

Get custom value

  • Props:
    • fieldName- String
  • Returns: String

# getKeywords()

Get keywords

  • Returns: String

# getModificationDate()

Get dodification date

  • Returns: Date

# getProducer()

Get producer

  • Returns: String

# getSubject()

Get subject

  • Returns: String

# getTitle()

Get title

  • Returns: String

# getTrapped()

Get trapped

  • Returns: String

# setAuthor(String author)

Set author

  • Props:
    • author- String
  • Returns: Document

# setCreationDate(Date creationDate)

Set creation date

  • Props:
    • creationDate- Date
  • Returns: Document

# setCreator(String creator)

Set creator

  • Props:
    • creator- String
  • Returns: Document

# setCustomValue(String fieldName, String fieldValue)

Set custom value

  • Props:
    • fieldName- String
    • fieldValue- String
  • Returns: Document

# setKeywords(String keywords)

Set keywords

  • Props:
    • keywords- String
  • Returns: Document

# setModificationDate(Date modificationDate)

Set modification date

  • Props:
    • modificationDate- Date
  • Returns: Document

# setProducer(String producer)

Set producer

  • Props:
    • producer- String
  • Returns: Document

# setSubject(String subject)

Set subject

  • Props:
    • subject- String
  • Returns: Document

# setTitle(String title)

Set title

  • Props:
    • title- String
  • Returns: Document

# setTrapped(String trapped)

Set trapped

  • Props:
    • trapped- String
  • Returns: Document

# getAccessPermission()

  • Returns: AccessPermission

# getAlias()

  • Returns: String

# getOwnerPassword()

  • Returns: String

# getPassword()

  • Returns: String

# setAccessPermission(AccessPermission accessPermission)

  • Props:
    • accessPermission- AccessPermission
  • Returns: Document

# setAlias(String alias)

  • Props:
    • alias- String
  • Returns: Document

# setOwnerPassword(String ownerPassword)

  • Props:
    • ownerPassword- String
  • Returns: Document

# setPassword(String password)

  • Props:
    • password- String
  • Returns: Document
